property.name: text
property.value: 1) Set DE Director "stopTime" as the largest number of your input data (here is 23519). 2) Open "InputLayer-HiddenLayer" and "HiddenLayer-OutputLayer" actors to see the next instructions.

property.name: text
property.value: 1) Open "LoadInputFiles" actor an choose the .csv files of your input data. 2) Double-click on "IFC" actor and set the dimensions of your input data. 3) Double-click on "Sigmoid" actor and set the dimensions of bias.

entity.name: weights
entity.doc: Read one line at a time from a text file and output as a string

entity.name: validation
entity.doc: Read one line at a time from a text file and output as a string

entity.name: biases
entity.doc: Read one line at a time from a text file and output as a string

property.name: text
property.value: 1) Open "InputDataFC" actor an choose the .csv files (weights and biases) of the hidden layer data. 2) Double-click on "FC" actor and set the dimensions of your hidden layer input data. 3) Double-click on "Sigmoid" actor and set the dimensions of bias.
